# Images framework

#### Requisites
- Python (>= 3.6)
- Opencv (>= 4.2.0.32)
- Scipy (>= 1.10.1)
- Rasterio (>= 1.2.10)
- Pillow (>= 8.4.0)
- Pascal-voc-writer (save detection in xml file)
- Gdal 2.4.4 (save detection in shapefile)

#### Usage
```
> python images_framework/test/images_framework_test.py
```
